author: The Babylon Bee
description:
What if the Constitution as we know it had never been written and had instead been left to modern politicians to draft? Find out all this and more in this security footage we obtained from an alternate timeline.

Check out @FreedomForum! Go to https://freedomforum.org/bee to get inspired, get analysis, get the latest news on all things brought to you by the First Amendment.

title: What If the Constitution Were Written Today?
